library(tidyverse)

```{r}
water_chem <- read_csv(here("data", "sbc_lter_registered_stream_chemistry.csv")) %>% 
  select(site_code, nh4_uM:spec_cond_uSpercm) %>% 
  na_if(-999)

water_summary <- water_chem %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(summary = mean(
    c_across(nh4_uM:spec_cond_uSpercm))
    ) %>% 
  select(site_code, summary)
```
